items.title: Transform 2025: Why observability is critical for AI agent ecosystems
items.description: New Relic's Ashan Willy talked about how they're instrumenting agentic systems for measurable ROI to maximize agentic AI.

items.title: Capital One builds agentic AI modeled after its own org chart to supercharge auto sales
items.description: Capital One's head of AI foundations explained at VB Transform on how the bank patterned its AI agents after itself.

items.title: Enterprise giants Atlassian, Intuit, and AWS are planning for a world where agents call the APIs
items.description: In the Women in AI breakfast, technologists from Atlassian, Intuit and AWS offered advice based on first-hand experience with AI agents.

items.title: From 30 days to 1: Chevron’s cloud migration ROI in real numbers
items.description: Chevron's agentic architectures must be able to process petabytes of data in the cloud and at the edge to support its critical operations.
